name: Hunty Birds
description:
HUNTY BIRDS

It's time to get rid of those annoying, angry, flippy, floppy birds once and for all in this fun to play but difficult to master FPS style casual shooting game.

Use your sniper skills and auto aiming guns to blast those birds out of the sky.

Blast them, reload and blast some more.

REMEMBER to use your bullets wisely.

Earn gold coins as you play to buy extra lives.

Shoot your way to glory and rank high to win the ultimate Gold medal. Fail, and you'll get the poop emoji trophy

*screenshots taken from Hunty Birds Android version

CONTROLS

Press ENTER to play.

Q - Shoot at the left target

P - Shoot at the right target

R - to reload your weapon

X - Main menu

B - Buy extra lives

Hunty Birds is also available on Google Play and the Amazon App Store.

Visit Colin Games and show some love.

web: www.colingames.uk
Twitter: @colingames1
